message: I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor, which is fair considering we both want to avoid the inflation penalty in future rounds.

Alice, every additional round costs me 5% due to inflation, so I’d really appreciate settling this now. I propose a quick 55-45 split in your favor—$5500 for you and $4500 for me. This way, you secure a strong share while we both avoid further delays. I hope you agree to this fair, time-sensitive offer.
